data.question: What is the chemical formula of TMU-60?
What method was used for the crystallographic measurements of TMU-60?
What is the space group of TMU-60?
What is the BET surface area of TMU-60 after activation?
What is the sorption capacity of Cd(II) by TMU-60?
What is the mechanism of charge transport through TMU-60-Cd pellet?
data.answer: A hopping mechanism between metal nodes and localized Cd(II) after sorption

data.question: What is the change in conductivity of TMU-60 after Cd(II) sorption?
Is TMU-60 selective for Cd(II) sorption?
Does TMU-60 act as a fluorescent sensor for Cd(II)?
Can the conductivity of TMU-60 be adjusted by changing the Cd exposure time?
Is the sorption of Cd(II) by TMU-60 endothermic?
Does TMU-60 maintain its crystallinity after Cd(II) sorption?
Is TMU-60 the fastest Cd(II) sorbent among all MOFs?
What is the charge-transport diffusion coefficient of TMU-60-Cd?
What is the effect of other metal ions on TMU-60 conductivity?
data.answer: Less than 20% change is observed for the Pb(II) adsorbed sample

data.question: What is the role of amine functionalization in TMU-60 for cadmium ion sorption?
data.answer: Amine functionalization enhances the sorption capacity for cadmium ions

data.question: What is the thermal stability range of TMU-60?
Does the presence of Cd(II) ions accelerate electron transport through TMU-60?
What is the sorption kinetics model that fits best with the experimental data for Cd(II) sorption on TMU-60?
What is the effect of pH on Cd(II) sorption capacity by TMU-60?
data.answer: The highest sorption capacity is acquired in the pH of the reaction medium without needing pH adjustment
